Sarge: Hohoho, you don't think those wussy shots could possibly hurt me? I'=
m the best, I can't be destroyed so easily!

He strikes a pose. Then all of=
 the shots hit him, missiles included, and he explodes. His head is blown o=
ff and flies at McGowan...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid=
* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 6:26 PM
  =
Subject: Re: Clash


  MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / VIRGO / ALBA / LEE / DEPP




=
  (McGowan ducks the 5 shots. She smiles at Termitron. She stands there smi=
ling at Termitron and then slowly takes aim and fires 2 missiles at Sarge. =
McGowan motions with her hands to her team mates.)



  (Barrymore is struc=
k by the rapids. She see's McGowan's hand motions and fires 7 laser beams a=
t Sarge.)



  (Virgo is struck by the rapids and fires a paralyzing dart a=
nd 5 machine gun bullets at Sarge after seeing McGowan's hand motions.)



=
  (Alba jumps over the 5 shots and looks at McGowan. She fired 2 jolts of e=
lectricity at Sarge.)



  (Lee is struck by the rapids. He looks at McGowa=
n and smiles. He fires a fireball at Sarge.)



  (Depp is struck by one mi=
ssile but ducks the other. He takes a few steps backwards, holding his kata=
na out straight in front of him. He turns away from Nightlight. He looks at=
 McGowan and then pulls out a rifle and fires a missile at Sarge...)

    -=
---- Original Message ----- 
    From: airly2000@... 
    To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 12:26 AM
    Subject: Re=
: Clash


    Windlord/Nightlight/Termitron::

    Windlord dodged most of =
Barrymore's and Lee's shots and he fired 15 
    against Lee and 10 against=
 Barrymore

    Termitron was flying around and avoiding most of his enemie=
s shots 
    and he fired 5 times against McGowan, 5 against Stiller, 10 ag=
ainst 
    Virgo and 5 against Alba.

    "SAVE TRinity" shouted Nightlight=
 to Lynzix. "I can handle this, please 
    Save Trinity..." Nightlight was=
 wounded in her right shoulder but she 
    fired 2 missiles against Depp

=
